Uses of Interface
com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.IQuery

Packages that use IQuery
com.ibm.team.repository.common.query   
 

Uses of IQuery in com.ibm.team.repository.common.query
 

Subinterfaces of IQuery in com.ibm.team.repository.common.query
 interface IDataQuery
          a data query is a type of query used for retrieving fields of related items, or values computed by aggregate or scalar functions.
 interface IItemQuery
          an item query is a type of query used for retrieving the handles of all items matching a set of filter criteria.
 

Methods in com.ibm.team.repository.common.query that return IQuery
 IQuery IQuery.distinct()
          Ensures each element in the query result is a distinct item handle
 IQuery IQuery.filter(IPredicate predicate)
          Adds a filter to the requested query to reduce the results returned.
 IQuery IDataQuery.groupBy(IField aField)
          Adds the fields to the tuple to be used for grouping data results using aggregate functions (e.g., IDataQuery.count() Example:
TeamQueryModel t = TeamQueryModel.ROOT;
IDataQuery query = IDataQuery.FACTORY.newInstance(t);
query.select(t.name(), query.count(t.members().itemId()));
query.groupBy(t.name());

would return results like:

Team USA, 25
Team Canada, 30

 IQuery IQuery.Factory.newInstance(IQueryModel queryModel)
           
 IQuery IQuery.orderByAsc(IField aField)
          Sorts the results of the query by the values for the queryable field, in ascending order

 IQuery IQuery.orderByAscUsingLocale(IStringField aField)
          Sorts the results of the query by the values for the queryable string field, in ascending order using the client's language locale.

 IQuery IDataQuery.select(ISelectionElement ele)
          Adds an element to the end of the selection list of this data query.
 IQuery IDataQuery.select(ISelectionElement[] elements)
          Adds a series of elements to the end of the selection list of this data query, in order.
 IQuery IDataQuery.select(ISelectionElement ele1, ISelectionElement ele2)
          Adds a series of elements to the end of the selection list of this data query.

          Adds a series of elements to the end of the selection list of this data query.
 

Methods in com.ibm.team.repository.common.query with parameters of type IQuery
 boolean IQuery.isSameQuery(IQuery query)
          Returns whether the given query is the same as this query.
